DOC.brief_title: A Diabetes Study Treat A Population Previously Not Target
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis Type 2 diabetes Previously treat commonly accepted start dose statin last 4 week prior study entry Fasting LDLC concentration > 2.0 mmol/L ( ≤ 5.0 mmol/L ) ( past 3 month ) History serum TG level ≤ 4.6 mmol/l ( past 3 month ) If currently receive therapy statin dose higher list Rosuvastatin ( current use ) Fibrates , niacin resin discontinue minimum 2 month prior enrolment . Type 1 diabetes ; glycated haemoglobin ( HbA1c ) > 9.0 % Alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) level ≥ 1.5 × upper limit normal ( ULN ) ( past 2 month ) Resting diastolic systolic blood pressure > 95 mmHg > 180 mmHg , respectively ( past 2 month ) Unexplained serum creatine kinase ( CK ) level > 3 × ULN ( past 2 month ) .
